thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 11 of 1754
thread.title: Julia

author: Julia
title: Julia
text: Searching online for an international one-way flight for four months from now (Toronto to Newcastle, UK) was really tiresome. FlightHub had the best option, next to another 3rd party site (I can't remember its name, Trip.. something) that had terrible reviews. I went with FlightHub based on the fact that 1. I had heard of them and 2. Their reviews were decent. Their site is easy to navigate and I received my confirmation email moments later after purchasing my ticket. So far, I have no complaints.
